segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is growing, and her foot is already in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on that plate, like nothing else exists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice before the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to no good, but she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t heard the water running like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside it’s chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool is going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is no one paying attention to what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
